message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to keep my investment within a certain budget. Could we perhaps negotiate the price down to $16000?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but I'm still confident that this product is worth more than $16000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $17000. What do you think?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, could we possibly agree on $16500 for the product?
Hi Bob, I'm still not willing to go as low as $16500. I'm willing to make another adjustment and offer it to you for $16800. I think this is a fair compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your efforts in adjusting the price, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $16600?
Hi Bob, I'm still not willing to go as low as $16600. I'm willing to make another adjustment and offer it to you for $16700. I think this is the best compromise we can reach. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I believe we can come to an agreement at $16650 for the product.
Hi Bob, I'm still not willing to go as low as $16650. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $16750. This is my final offer. What do you think?
Considering all our previous discussions, I believe we can finalize the deal at $16700 for the product.
